original_text: And the second angel sounded, and as it were a great mountain burning with fire was cast into the sea: and the third part of the sea became blood;
korean_text: 둘째 천사가 나팔을 부니 불 붙는 큰 산과 같은 것이 바다에 던져지매 바다의 삼분의 일이 피가 되고

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 두 번째 천사가 나팔을 불었고

sentences.original_text: and as it were a great mountain burning with fire
and the third part of the sea became blood
